author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 16-year-old school boy, who allegedly killed his relative girl, surrendered before a court here on Monday.

A native of Pudhu Ayakudi in Dindigul, he was studying Plus One. Namakkal police took him under their custody for further investigation. C. Abirami of Namakkal was pursing her course in a teacher training college in Budhan Sandhai. The boy approached the girl’s parents with a marriage proposal. When her parents turned down his proposal, the irked boy slit her throat with a knife while she was sleeping in her room last Friday and fled from the house.
title: Murder: 16-year-old boy surrenders in court
